comment: The entire semester was filled with writing assignments, all around 1000 words, but they are on topics you choose, so it isn't that bad. The class starts tough with lots of assignments, but every week gets easier. I got 100's on every assignment except one due to not showing revisions. No lectures, but seems very sweet and experienced from intro.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: No test or quizzes, but easy writing prompts every week!!
There's a reason why Professor Stephenson has basically a perfect rating, this Professor is an amazing person and loves to write. I loved her lectures, you can't go wrong with Professor Stephenson!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Take her If you want a easy , but there tons of writing assignments that are little confusing! No test or quizzes, just tons of writing.

Prof. Stephenson is a very kind lady. Her homework assignments are interesting and not too difficult. There is an assignment every week and youll get 100 if you follow the instructions. Easy A Take her!!

I took this class asynchronously and at first, I was hesitant, but I loved it! You have a whole week if not two to complete the assignments. Her grading is very clear and easy to access outside of class. TAKE HER!
Easiest literature class I have ever taken in my life. She doesn't require a lot of work either. Just read summary of the texts your supposed to and answer the questions and you get an A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: It's easy A, but the only problem that I have is that there is a ton of writing in this course!
She was easily one of the best teachers to have for the course.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Super easy, just write papers, and express opinions on discussions, easy A
rating_tags: So many papers--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Take this professor for a easy A!!

This was one of my easiest classes the entire semester. I sometimes forgot that i was actually taking this class because of how easy it was. Assignments were always due on a Sunday at 11:59pm. There was always clear instructions for each assignment and I never made less than a 100 on anything.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Amazing choice for those looking for English course professors. Assignment instructions may not be clear cut but she responds to any concerns and questions very quickly and is very caring! Weekly assignments due every Sunday by midnight and theyre graded with ease. Got a 100 average in both her 1102 and 2110. Topics are also interesting.

Easiest summer class to take. I was initially worried that there would be lots of papers, but there wasn't. The assignments can be a bit confusing (whether it be what is asked for or the instructions), but she is okay with you turning in the assignment again for full credit. A group chat is really helpful to have in this class. Overall, great class

Dr. Stephenson is wonderful. She is extremely quick to respond to emails, gives clear grading criteria, and is overall a great professor. The class itself is not difficult, but you must put in the work. She is an easy grader, and I enjoyed reading the topics she assigned. Would DEFINITELY take again! She is wonderful and easy!

Professor Stephenson is such a sweet lady. She really cares about her students and wants you to succeed. Her assignments are not always clear, but she is happy to answer questions. She also grades very easily on every assignment. Take this professor!!
Easiest English class ever. She gives you a 100 as long as you do the assignment. Stuff was due weekly on Sundays, never took too much time. She responds very quickly to emails.
sweetest professor ever. Her class consisted of some readings, writing assignments, 100 words each, and tests about them. she's very caring and it is an easy A class. take her
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Take this professor if you want an easy A. I took her over the summer and there was an essay due every two weeks and they weren't that bad. A rough draft, revised draft, and final draft is required. A couple of other assignments throughout the week are also due. She replies quickly to emails and takes a little long to grade.

The course consists of a few papers, discussion posts, and small assignments. Topics and instructions were simple and easy to follow. If you are struggling to understand just reach out and she will help you. I didn't reach the word requirement for a couple of papers and I still got great grades so don't worry about that. Great prof to take online
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is a great woman and a great teacher. She gives a decent amount of assignments/essays (about 1 or 2 a week), but they are all super short (usually 100 words) and easy. She gives you a 100 as long as you follow the directions. You do not need to get the book, you can find all the stories online. I got an A without putting in much effort.

This was by far a very confusing class. Her instructions were always unclear, when you ask for clarity she's never certain. The entire class were left trying to figure it out together the entire semester. Please be prepared to write a lot , and I mean ALOT! She requires you to revise your own papers and wants a revision with every Essay.

I made a 100 on almost every paper and some of them werent even earned. She is the easiest grader I have ever taken. I still learned a lot in this course though. There is definitely a lot of papers, but if you are looking for an easy A, this is it.

I took this class online, easiest class I could have ever taken. As long as you do the assignment, you get a 100. She is always available by email and responds quickly. You do not need the book, any time she reference the book for help on an assignment you can just google the information and use any source.

Great teacher and easy A. There are a few small group presentations, but even as somebody who hates presenting, I didn't mind them at all. Attendance is mandatory and taken, but as long as you show up and do the work, you will get an A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Caring

comment: Possibly the sweetest woman and professor I've ever met!!! She genuinely cares about her students and wants to see you succeed. The class is super easy, just small writing assignments, a few group presentations, and taking notes and writing short summary on films, just do the work and you'll get 100s. Such an amazing woman and a really easy A!!!

very sweet professor! she really cares about her students. she does take attendance every class. if you do what she asks then you will get 100 on literally everything. just put forth the effort to complete the assignments and group projects! dont bother getting the textbooks, i rented it on amazon (just in case) and didnt even use it.

She's the sweetest person you will ever meet. Do what she asks and you will receive 100(she isn't strict) and we got 3 presentations were super easy. BTW I fix all my essays that got lower scores after the final presentation and just received 100 all of them, gosh she's just perfect. An easy A.

This is honestly the easiest class you could ever take. All assignments are straightforward and easy if you put in the work. The papers are all easy and every grade in this class is basically a 100 if you do what she says. There are discussion posts and journals which require the textbook but you can find pdf's online. Definitely recommend taking!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Take this prof! Its such an easy A! There are about 2-3 assignments due every sunday and they are so easy. As long as you do it and turn it in you get 100! I got 100's on everything including all my papers! Its the easiest english class you can take! The whole class is a completion grade. I ended the class with a 100 avg. Just do the work.

She is literally the sweetest person Ive ever met! Her stories made her clsss that much interesting! She does give out a lot of small assignments, however, they are so easy! Basically, if you show up to class and just do the work youll pass. LITERALLY! We had 3 quizzes but shell go over them before you take them. Walk in the park, easiest A!
Awesome teacher. Fair grader. If you do the homework and classwork you will get an A. She is great, would take again!!

EASIEST A! You don't have to read or even study for tests. She goes over the test answers right before you take the test. Lots of in class movies and easy homework. The only way to fail is not caring whatsoever. Kind, hilarious woman who tells great stories of her life. Would take again if I could.

Professor Stephenson is amazing. She has a very seasoned life and will provide wonderful stories. She's very caring and totally understands the stress of college life. Her assignments are straightforward and simple. The entirety of the class (even the "final") is pretty much do it and pass, just make sure you give it at least some effort.

She is the most random professor. For 10 weeks the first drafts of our essays were due on a Thursday. Then week 11 it's due on Wednesday. It totally messed me up. She has consistent mistakes in all of her assignments. For example; misspelling words, incorrect punctuation, and even just flat out omitting words. I would not take her again.
Easiest A ever. I took her online 1102 class. A lot of assignments, but you just need to follow her guidelines. Very lenient grader, just do what is asked of you and you'll definitely pass.

The class consists of journals, group projects, quizzes, and assignments. You can get 100's easily by meeting her requirements and she isn't strict. However, the catch is that she gives a lot of journals, assignments, and group projects. The only thing that could be difficult is the quizzes but she gives you the answers to half of the questions.

I enjoyed taking her class! She isn't the "traditional" English teacher. She allows you to explore your creative side and is easy on grading papers. Very fun class. There are journal entries, essays, free writing, and a research project. Prepare to do a lot of writing, but isn't that expected in an English class? at least she makes it enjoyable.

We had a couple group projects that were weighted a good bit.  Otherwise it was a very easy class.  Pretty much, if you turn in a paper, you get an A.  She is a very cool little old lady with an amazing history.  She knows her stuff, and loves teaching.  I would highly recommend her, I absolutely adored her.

she's your pretty standard teacher. Basically if you turn in the work you'll get a 100. It can be tedious, but if you're willing to do the work it'll probably be the easiest A you'l earn at Kennesaw. A few discussions for the online class nothing hard or Impossible. I would recommend her if you're looking for a class to not put much effort into.

Great teacher, I would recommend.  Basically if you did the work she gave you a 100 every time.  If you did most of an assignment you'd get a 80. Half- you get a 50. None- a zero.  online ENGL1101 course consisted of a few journal assignments a week, an essay every week or two, and a discussion post every other week. No heavy reading.

Professor Stephenson is such a great and easy professor! I got a C in 1101 and have yet to make below a 90 on anything in her 1102 class. I'm taking it online over the summer and it is so easy. There's a good bit of somewhat tedious work but it's very manageable and easy to make an A if you manage your time.

The work load in her class is HUGE, but if you are willing to do it all, not matter the quality, you will get an A for sure. Even though her grading criteria is Extremely unclear, expect to do at least two papers a week. There are multiple choice quizzes which she tells you half of the answers to, but no tests. Easy A if u are willing to work hard.

I didn't know my grade until the very end. Her grading criteria is unclear, but your grade will consists of a ton of papers, a few quizzes and a group project. The papers are easy because she will give you a perfect score no matter the quality. Thing is, there are two papers a week, if not more. Just do all the work and you will get an A for sure.

Took her class online which had minimum 1 assignment due a week. You really need to be self motivated and not wait till last minute for the assignments because she will require entire essays in 1 week with min 3 drafts. Always responded to emails and was very helpful when needed. Not too tough of a grader and was up for discussion about most grades

Nice prof, but you should take another class if you want to learn a lot about global literature and the history and cultures surrounding it. We read Gilgamesh, Oedipus, Dante's Inferno, Hamlet, Tartuffe, and watched the films What Dreams May Come, Oedipus, Hamlet, Selma, and documentaries on Shakespeare, Dante, Emmett Till & Martin Luther King Jr.

She's been teaching for 50+ yrs. Easy 100's on 100 word weekly journals, and 200 word take home test essays, & outlines. A few kinda tough in-class quizzes. One group presentation project. Some movies. Though it was World Lit, we spent the last 1/4 of the class on the Am. Civil Rights movement, learning Am. history instead of literature, strangely.

Take her for online! I hate English a lot but this class was so easy! There were quite a bit of assignments due each week but they were pretty simple and easy 100s. Her essay were pretty simple to write about and she does not seem like a harsh grader. The final was a research paper on a topic of our choice. Great professor and an easy A!

I took this class online and there are a lot of small assignments each week, but you'll basically get a 100 if you finish it. There are some longer assignments and her instructions aren't always very clear, but overall it isn't a bad class.

One of the best literature teachers I've ever had.  I recommend that you take the hybrid class.  It is easy, fun, and you learn about theater.  Just do the work! Its not hard, and she's not a strict grader.

If you just do the assignments, no matter the quality, you will get a 100. The downside to this is she gives a lot of them (three of the assignments were over 2,500 words for example), so be prepared to work. You can try emailing her with questions, but she never responds, not that it matters because you only get 100's. Class is a joke but needed.

Some of her project rubrics are vague.  Essays assigned back-to-back-to-back throughout the semester.  Show up and do the work and you will probably get an A.  Miss 2 classes you will probably get a B; miss 3 and you will only be able to get a B at best, probably a C.

I have taken Stephenson for English 1101 and 1102. I will say, I would have rather taken this class in person rather than online, but she didn't have room in schedule. Either way, the load is pretty heavy at times, writing reviews, outlines and analytical journals. You also have to write in the discussion each week. I got an A, so wasn't too hard.

She is the best english professor you will ever take. She's older, but she is the nicest, most helpful and enthusiastic teacher I've ever had. The really don't have "homework" but we have out of class assignments that are super easy. I love her so much that I'm taking her for 2 classes next semester and 1 in the fall. You won't regret taking her.

If there is a spot open for her class, well it won't last long - no matter what she's teaching. I took her 1102 film class. It was great and got to watch movies. Papers and presentations are a piece of cake. Easy A!

I took her for 1101 and 1102. Granted, this class was harder. We watched more movies, but there were more papers and we had a research paper due at the end of the semester. It was suppose to include 8 sources and be a minimum of 1,500 words. It wasn't too bad other than that. We watched really good movies and had two group presentations.

Easiest class ever. She ends class almost 20 minutes early every class. Very very sweet lady. The writing prompts are incredibly clear. If you do what they say you make an A. Attendance is mandatory but you have three free absences until it harms your grade. If you have to take English 1101 please take this course. So easy.
She is a great professor. There are plenty of of work but they are easy work. The works isn't to be turn in til the portfolio is due. Easy grade!

I will be graduating in the fall and this is one of the few professors that I have taken that I felt really cared for their students.  She is very laid back but does have expectations that you are mature and will complete your work.  If you need extra help with your work ask!  She is more than willing to help! I watched movies I enjoyed.

If you take her make sure when you give your speeches that they are OVER the top. Dress up for them, she expects more then you would think. So go the extra mile and she'll love you. Tests are easy and basically simple logic.
Great teacher, very laid-back.  I had her for a special topics class, and it was awesome.  We watched movies and wrote papers.  Best class, easy A.

Very laid back, very good! She is truly fascinated with her students&job. Her experience with the subject is amazing. Her personal stories&devotion to her students is great! She is understanding & not strict with deadlines at all, ask for an extension & you get it. She encourages asking questions&has made the course interesting beyond expectations!

Professor Stephenson, is amazing in that she loves her work, she is pretty clear on what she talks about in class, and focuses on Movies and videos in her composition classes. She is pretty laid back when it comes to assignments, and grades more on effort than content. If you procrastinate, she will not give you a favorable grade.

If you don't want to learn anything. This is the professors for you. She's extremely laid back. However, many students from my class had to drop, because of her lack of pressure for deadlines, a lot of us procrastinated and couldn't finish the work by the end of the semester. To get an A, time management is the key, just get everything done.

She is one of the most laid back teachers I've ever had, all the work is portfolio so you only turn in 3 times in the semester. Overall 3 essays and maybe 25 half page responses. I highly reccomend taking her
She's really old, but cool old. Best teacher I've had at SPSU so far. ROLL TIDE

Great proffesor. She might be old but she is very wise, respectful, and extremely interesting. She cares about her students and wants them to enjoy her class. I strongly recommend her! You won't regret taking a class with her
I recommend her. Fun class, interesting teacher. If you give a good effort, you will get a good grade.  I'd take her again if I needed one of her classes.
Took her for ENGL 1101 as well. She is very nice and if you just put effort into your work you will do fine. The only thing I didnt like about her was that her classes are mainly from 6AM to 9AM
Great Teacher, only had 3 speeches and 2 tests, just put alittle effort into speeches and u will be fine
Great, helpful and fun
AWEOME TEACHER!!! Very Helpful and lets you express yourself in your papers without grading with a bias.
Very nice lady. Class was a breeze, we watched lots of movies, and wrote a few papers. Highly recommended.
Fair
She is a really nice teacher. we used the textbook about everyday. she takes roll everyday and doesn't like tardieness.
Loved this class.  She is a great teacher and so helpful.  Truly wants everyone to do well and gives a big curve on exams.  Take this class if you can!
Great teacher! Work isn't hard. Expect to write quite a few things. Grading is fair as long as you do your work. I would highly recommend her.

She was really sweet and Nice. Very Helpful, I would highly recommend her.She is an easy A, all you have to do it your work turn it in. Attendance isn't strict but its recommended that you attend class. I loved her

This class was pathetically easy.  The teacher was alright, but I imagine you'd have to be a complete moron to get less than an "A" in her class. ... As long as you've mastered sentence fragments and runnons, you'll get an "A".  ... It's not really a lot of work, but if you procrastinate, it adds up (nothing you can't do the night before 'till 6AM)

She was an awesome teacher! There was some work, not too much work, but if you stayed on top of it then it wasn't a big deal. There are like three major papers you have to write, which were very easy. She grades her papers very leniately. She is also a very nice person as well.

One of the most caring professors I have had in a while. The classwork is basically writing your opinion and than you do a few major papers on the side. She is s very nice lady who will help you however she can and as long as you try you are going to get an A.
IF you just keep up with your work, you will get a good grade in the class.  just do your work!!
Really easy teacher, i just missed a few assignments.

She is the best teacher, I had her for Drama Appreciation and she very easy when it comes to grading, I would recommend her 100%!!! she is very nice and EASY!!! you will not suffer in this class by taking her
take this teacher!...she gives a lot of work but just complete the assignments and give a little effort and you will Ace her class

This teacher is awesome!  There is a decent amount of work in her class, but it is really straightforward and graded very leinently.  She is a very nice lady and will help you in any way she can. I had her for both 1101 and 1102, and got an A both semesters.  I recommend her to anyone!
Her class is so easy. I have friends in other 1102 classes that do twice the work with other teachers. She grades very easy and her assignments are usually short and easy. I highly recommend her.

man, she is the greatest!! she is an awesome teacher. she really knows how to teach. Her clss is full of busy works. but they are mostly easy and about your opinions. Very fair on grades. Do the work, and keep those works!
this class is so damn easy...I never come & still get A's on everything...she gives u a packet that outlines the entire semester..do the packet & it's smooth sailing
Great Teacher. You have to really really try to do poorly in her class.
Excellent class.. take Professor Stephenson, a valuable advice to you from me!
Do the work and get an A.  Her grading is very lenient.
If you have the chance to take her class sign up, i promise you will forever be changed. She's one of the few professors who has the gift of molding any individual into an skilled writter.
Very easy class. Just do the in-class writings and keep up with your work and you will get an A.  Grades essays very easily, just follow the correct format.

This class does require a bunch of writing but usually each writing is not much longer than a paragraph. They are farly easy and the first thing she says to you when u enter the class is that if you are here every day you will most likely end up with an A and so far that has proven true.
Very easy teacher, very helpful too. Easy to get an A in her class.
Good teacher, some writing required which is easy to do, do the work and get an A!
Got an A in 1101 and 1102.  Lots and lots of writing, but graded very easily.  Go to class and write and expect an A.
Great Professor!! She is awesome!
great techer! 90% of the class got A's. very easy...not critical in any way...I slacked off on one of my last reports and got a 100 on it..same with some of my buddies
easy a
A VERY HELPFUL AND CONCERNED PROFESSOR. hAS A LOT OF WRITING BUT ALLOWS CLASS TIME TO DO HALF OF IT. VERY HELPFUL AND CLEAR
good prof, liked the class
If you want a lot of busy work and no lectures take this class.  Very little lecturing. Mostly students read something and then there is an in class writting, plus major papers on the side.
No Comments
She is a very easy teacher.  All u have to do is make sure u do all your assignments and then you will be set.
Do the assignments on time and a little work and the class is a breeze.
